content: An elevated TCE environment, together with more owned shipping days from our expanded fleet contributed to significant year-over-year growth in revenue, net income, adjusted EBITDA and free cash flow during the second quarter. Charter expenses paid to third-party ship owners increased to $65.7 million from $62.6 million in the second quarter of last year, a 5% increase due to increases in market rates to charter in vessels.
